definition: to catch fish/(fig.) to loaf on the job/to be slack/to take it easy
to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract
to fish in troubled water (idiom); to take advantage of a crisis for personal gain
to fish in troubled water (idiom); to take advantage of a crisis for personal gain/also written 渾水摸魚|浑水摸鱼

sentences.english: You delight to fish in troubled waters.
Never fish in problem runing waterdrop.
Beware of those who fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 小心那些混水摸鱼的人。

sentences.english: If the boss sees you slackign off, he might pay you less.
sentences.chinese: 老板若看到你摸鱼，他也许会扣你薪水。

sentences.english: LL: Well, it's only one fish. I wouldn't go overboard.
sentences.chinese: 你不会是叫我下到海水里去摸鱼吧？

sentences.english: The pusher, not qualified products to sell fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 致使不法商贩浑水摸鱼，出售不合格产品。

sentences.english: Some of the workers in our office always goof off when the boss is out.
sentences.chinese: 办公室里的某些员工总会趁老板不在时摸鱼。

sentences.english: All they wanted was to make bad blood between them, aggravate differences and fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 他们就是要挑拨离间，扩大分歧，以便浑水摸鱼。

sentences.english: If the boss sees you slacking off, he might pay you less.
sentences.chinese: 老板若看到你摸鱼，他也许会扣你薪水。

sentences.english: Really bald in La "fish in troubled waters" in the felling of trees.
sentences.chinese: 真的光头强可在腊人“浑水摸鱼”在砍伐树木。

sentences.english: All they wanted was to make bad blood between them and fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 他们所要做的就是挑拨离间，混水摸鱼。

sentences.english: During the decline of the stock market , some people fished in troubled waters and made big money.
sentences.chinese: 在股票市场下跌期间，一些人浑水摸鱼，赚了大钱。

sentences.english: Another improvement to the food supply was when my elder brother and I went to catch fish in the river.
sentences.chinese: 另一个改善生活的手段是我和哥哥一起去河里摸鱼。

sentences.english: This examination will be strictly carried out, so there is no chance to fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 这次考核非常严格，没有混水摸鱼的可能。

sentences.english: Someone fishes in troubled water, empress Yi bow the Lue arrived air.
sentences.chinese: 有人混水摸鱼，将后羿弓掠到了空中。

sentences.english: You can fish in troubled waters.

definition: to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
to fish with a hook and bait
to shy away from work/to get by without attending duty
